data.text: @smerconish @nbcsnl On Twitter 280.  The research by Twitter in the test period of 280, shows negligible amounts of tweets over 180... at least so far.

@smerconish @nbcsnl Here's a golden rule when you're following comedy: 

YOU CANNOT BE MORE OFFENDED THAN THE PERSON THE JOKE WAS MEANT TO BE OFFENSIVE TO!
@smerconish @nbcsnl The choices you gave on this poll are too  far apart.  Most people somewhere in between, that’s what your total number of votes were low...
